name: mikapyon
description:
miKaPyon is a rabbit girl in a colorful 3D platformer full of fast freerunning and jump challenges, wall-jumps and sliding over hills and loops.

Reach for the Stars ☆

Your tasks: reach goals, collect stars, moons and beat best-times!
You can not "die" but fall, slide, bounce around and drop your stars.
The world is friendly but challenging! Explore at your own pace.
Use stars to reach new places! The sky is the limit ... or is it?
